        Specified by:
        setConfiguration in interface CouchDbInstance

        nodeName - the name of the node to query for the configuration, if it is null the _local node will be queried

      • describeCluster

        public MembershipInfo describeCluster()
        Description copied from interface: CouchDbInstance
        Displays the nodes that are part of the cluster as cluster_nodes. The field all_nodes displays all nodes this node knows about, including the ones that are part of the cluster.
        Specified by:
        describeCluster in interface CouchDbInstance
